name: Jio World Convention Centre
description: Large, premium convention complex with divisible halls, top-tier AV, and easy BKC access—ideal for tech and corporate seminars.
address: Bandra Kurla Complex (BKC), Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: NESCO (Bombay Exhibition Centre) — Hall 1
description: High-capacity exhibition & conference hall frequently used for industry summits, trainings, and trade seminars.
address: Western Express Highway, Goregaon East, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: NCPA — Tata Theatre
description: Iconic auditorium with excellent acoustics and seating; hosts talks, book launches, and policy forums.
address: NCPA Marg, Nariman Point, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: St. Andrew’s Auditorium
description: Well-equipped proscenium auditorium popular for conferences, workshops, and community seminars.
address: St. Dominic Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: IIT Bombay — Convocation Hall
description: University auditorium used for academic conferences, tech talks, and industry seminars inside the IITB campus.
address: Main Gate Rd, Powai, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR ICON — Phoenix Palladium
description: Premium multiplex with recliners and advanced projection; popular for premieres and weekend shows.
address: High Street Phoenix, Lower Parel, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: INOX — R City Mall
description: Busy eastern-suburb multiplex offering multiple screens, Dolby sound, and ample parking.
address: R City Mall, Ghatkopar West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR — Phoenix Marketcity Kurla
description: Large mall multiplex with frequent showtimes and convenient F&B options.
address: Phoenix Marketcity, LBS Marg, Kurla West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR — Oberoi Mall Goregaon
description: Modern multiplex serving the Goregaon–Film City area; known for clean auditoriums and quick access.
address: Oberoi Mall, Film City Rd, Goregaon East, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR — Inorbit Mall Malad
description: Popular western-suburb multiplex with multiple screens and late-night shows.
address: Inorbit Mall, Link Rd, Malad West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR ICON — Infiniti Mall Andheri (Versova)
description: High-end multiplex with plush seating and strong show line-up for Andheri/Versova audiences.
address: Infiniti Mall, New Link Rd, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR — Juhu (Dynamix Mall)
description: Neighbourhood favourite multiplex close to Juhu beach with balanced Hindi & Hollywood programming.
address: Dynamix Mall, Juhu Tara Rd, Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: Metro INOX Cinemas
description: Art-deco heritage cinema upgraded with modern projection and sound systems.
address: M.G. Road, Dhobi Talao, Marine Lines, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: Regal Cinema
description: Historic single-screen landmark near Gateway of India; a classic movie-going experience.
address: Colaba Causeway, Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: G7 Multiplex (Gaiety–Galaxy)
description: Seven-screen complex famous for first-day-first-show energy for big Bollywood releases.
address: S.V. Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: Maratha Mandir
description: Legendary single screen known for long theatrical runs; retains old-school charm.
address: Dr. Anandrao Nair Marg, Mumbai Central, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: INOX — Atria Mall (INSIGNIA)
description: Luxury screens with lounge seating and curated F&B in central Mumbai.
address: Atria Mall, Annie Besant Rd, Worli, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: PVR — Nirmal Lifestyle Mulund
description: Convenient option for central & north-eastern suburbs with multiple daily showtimes.
address: Nirmal Lifestyle Mall, LBS Rd, Mulund West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: Cinépolis — Andheri (Fun Republic)
description: Well-known Andheri venue with upgraded projection and comfortable seating.
address: Fun Republic, Veera Desai Rd, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: INOX — Growel's 101
description: Family-friendly suburban multiplex with easy parking and food options.
address: Growel's 101 Mall, Akurli Rd, Kandivali East, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
